relevant_findings.HEENT: Sclerae anicteric, dry mucous membranes, PERRL
relevant_findings.neck: Supple, JVP not elevated, no LAD
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Bradycardic, II/VI systolic murmur heard across precordium
relevant_findings.lungs: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes, rales, rhonchi
relevant_findings.abdomen: Soft, epigastric tenderness and chest wall tenderness to palpation; no rebound or guarding; well-healed abdominal incisions
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, well perfused, 2+ pulses, no clubbing, cyanosis or edema
relevant_findings.neurological: CNII-XII grossly intact; moving all four extremities; sensation intact

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Overall pain has improved; continues to report epigastric pain, associated with nausea; no BRBPR or melena.
